title: Yay I hit honor level five!
body:
http://i.imgur.com/dqn5x3v.png

I also got all five of the honor icons.

http://i.imgur.com/1iwRqyZ.png

After all the crud I have to deal with in the real world and on top of that college has started again, I am really happy to get something that makes me feel nice and bubbly.

replies.body:
How come you guys don't comment on any of the ideas people have in this section. You just comment on someone's achievement of good behavior. Makes me and everyone else think you honestly aren't concerned about the players.  I feel like I'd be honour five at this point if I had a self mute option.  Just a little strange that people have been suggesting for 4 or 5 seasons and I haven't read any statements from a riot employee about why they won't implement a self mute option.  This game is highly competitive and team based, seems like if you knew you might get upset that game a self mute would prevent any raging from someone who just wanted to play this amazing game you guys have created.

I love league of legends, but I'm not perfect.
Hah its the imitation of Evangelion.
I know the feel, buddy. I feel a bit childish to be as delighted as I am by such a little thing, and yet I am ^^
Congrats, and welcome to the club!  {{sticker:vlad-salute}}
Good job keep up the good work!

Grats! Very happy to see players getting this. Makes me feel a little more at ease when I see honor 5 on my team.

Most of the time they are deserving and helpful.

Congrats.

I've been spamming games left and right, yet I'm still at honor level 4.  While people on my friends list have Honor level 5 and they barely play, lmao.  I don't get it.

The grind is exhausting, to be honest.
I got honor level 5 then two days later I got a 14 days ban...
